endpoints.description: Retrieve the details of a specific insurance claim by ID.
Update an existing insurance claim's information.
Fetch the list of all active insurance policies under the user.
Retrieve details of a specific insurance policy.
Submit a request to renew an existing insurance policy.
List all payment transactions related to policies and claims.
Initiate a new payment for policy renewal or claim settlement.
Submit feedback regarding the insurance service.
Retrieve a list of notifications related to policy activities and claims.
